definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Red edge position (REP, 680-780 nm) has been used for evaluating crop leaves nitrogen status.
sentences.chinese: 红边位置常被用于监测作物叶片氮素营养状况。

sentences.english: Air whips past the blades of a turbine, forcing it to spin.
sentences.chinese: 经过风轮叶片的空气迫使风轮旋转，风轮驱动电机。

sentences.english: This thesis presents the new technology in the axial-flow fan blade continous adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了国内外轴流风机叶片调节新技术。

sentences.english: Variegation The occurrence of patches of different colors on leaves or flowers.
sentences.chinese: 植物叶片或花表面出现的彩色斑块。

sentences.english: The activities of CAT, a cold-sensitive enzyme, were decreased rapidly in both leaves and roots after chilling.
sentences.chinese: 低温弱光导致了叶片和根系中CAT活性的显著降低。

sentences.english: Leaf total water content was not observed to be closely related with cold resistance.
sentences.chinese: 抗寒力的提高与叶片总水含量关系不密切。

sentences.english: In China, some aero-engines start to use single crystal turbine blades in practice.
sentences.chinese: 在国内，某些发动机上亦开始使用单晶涡轮转子叶片。

sentences.english: The leaf stalk supports the leaf blade.
sentences.chinese: 叶柄的作用是支持叶片。

sentences.english: The results showed that leaf spot of P. canariensis mainly occurred on leaves and petioles.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，加那利海枣叶斑病主要发生在叶片和叶柄。

sentences.english: Mix lime juice with ground drumstick pods and leaves.
sentences.chinese: 混合石灰汁与地面鼓槌吊舱和叶片。

sentences.english: The complex surface matching and machining allowance solving have been done.
sentences.chinese: 叶片曲面的匹配及加工余量的计算。

sentences.english: On the leaf epidermis of tribe Triticeae (Gramineae) in relation to its taxonomical significance.
sentences.chinese: 小麦族叶片表皮微形态观察及其分类意义的探讨。

sentences.english: Blades of green grass brushed her face .
sentences.chinese: 草儿的叶片拂过她的脸庞。

sentences.english: The LP casing blade of unit 3 in Tuoketuo Power Plant is broken after only three months operation.
sentences.chinese: 托电3号机组低压缸叶片运行仅3个月就发生了断裂。

sentences.english: Proline contents were related to leaf age and species.
sentences.chinese: 叶片脯氨酸的含量与叶龄和植物种类有关。

sentences.english: Changes the nature ensiform leaf blade to be tall and slender. It has the obvious midrib.
sentences.chinese: 革质剑形叶片细长，具明显的中肋。

definition: venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
terminal bud (growing at the tip of a plant)
